extendedInfo.description: This is a remote control for your Roku, but does way more than your standard remote could ever do!2 Day trial for RoByteâ¢ No Setup requiredâ¢ RoByte is the only Roku remote designed for tabletsâ¢ Easy channel switcherâ¢ Use your keyboard for super fast text & voice entry on channels like Netflix etc.â¢ Navigate using D-pad or Swipe-Padâ¢ Pair with multiple Roku playersâ¢ Customizable Widgets for your home screenâ¢ Option to keep the wifi from sleeping (in menu)â¢ Hitting your phone's search button brings you to the channel's search pageâ¢ Multiple language supportLanguage support:â¢ Englishâ¢ EspaÃ±ol (Spanish)â¢ íêµ­ì(Korean)â¢ Deutsch (German)â¢ FranÃ§ais (French)â¢ Bahasa Indonesia**Please contact us directly before giving us a 1 star. We are very happy to help troubleshoot any issues you have**Support: tinybyteapps@gmail.comTwitter: http://twitter.com/TinyByteAppsFacebook: http://www.facebook.com/TinyByteAppsThis Roku remote is not designed to control Roku SoundBridgeTags: Roku Remote, Roku box, Roku player, Roku Inc. reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Kyle Hinchman

reviews.title: Search Bug
reviews.comment: Used the trial version on my ASUS Transformer prime and during a search,  of titles , after typing the name and followed by the space key the first three to five  of the  letters, depending on the length of the name, were added with no screen touches. I tried several times with different names with the same result. Other than that,  I was impressed with how the program worked. Still, I would not pay for it since search is a major feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad...not what I expected either
reviews.comment: One of the reasons why I was looking for an Android app was because I didn\'t care for the physical layout of the remote control. However the app is pretty much the same thing, and it is slightly less responsive then the actual remote control.   Although setup was very easy; and while this may not be the fault of the developer I found the features lacking. The Android app really doesn\'t give any benefits over the crappy factory remote that came with the unit.  I am grateful for the trail, but I would not buy this program unless it add new features such as remote control skins, and customizing button locations and more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I LOVE THIS APP
reviews.comment: THANK YOU..my experience with this app is amazing..it works great..i noticed no lag time at all..this is just awesome all the way..one remote can easily be lost misplaced an broken..i got this app for a backup remote..after using it i decided this is my primary remote now..thank you for such an excellent app..5 stars !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung D710
reviews.comment: Updated review:  Got it to work just fine.  Problem was  my operator error.  I turned on the phones wifi but forgot to connect to my network.  Very responsive customer support!  Thanks!!!

reviews.title: INCREDIBLE!
reviews.comment: Wow.  I purchased another Roku app, but it sure as heck can\'t remember my connection settings, and neither can it connect to multiple devices OR rename those devices, like kitchen, bedroom, or living room. I\'m impressed!  This app connected ASAP.  Once this app connects to all three of my devices, I\'m buying this!  I really appreciate a two day full trial, also. I wish other developers did this. I\'ve gotten stuck with a few stinky apps.

reviews.title: Now fixed on the Gnex !
reviews.comment: Great developer response. Quick updates issued previous issues with Gnex. Now works great with the Verizon Galaxy NEXUS.  Intuitive design. Elegant layout. Love it so far. Thanx  to the dev for responding so quickly!
